articles.author: Andrew Miller
articles.title: The magician who became a puritan, James Anderson faces final curtain - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Who could have conceived 20 years ago that England's Burnley firework would become a model of consistency and longevity?
articles.content:
News AnalysisWho could have conceived 20 years ago that England's Burnley firework would become a model of consistency and longevity?
